resources.string: Android (from Greek andro - "man, male", relative suffix - "robot"; "humanoid robot") - smartphones, tablets, e-books, digital players, wristwatches, fitness bracelets, game consoles, laptops, netbooks, smartbooks, Google Glass is an operating system for glasses[2], televisions[3], projectors, and other devices (in 2015, it was also installed in car entertainment systems[4] and household robots).
